item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Sometimes glass glitters more than diamonds because it has more to prove." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Some humans would do anything to see if it was possible to do it. If you put a large switch in some cave somewhere, with a sign on it saying 'End-of-the-World Switch. PLEASE DO NOT TOUCH', the paint wouldn't even have time to dry." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Reading is one form of escape. Running for your life is another." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Basically, I have two speeds.... Hostile or smart-aleck. Your choice." -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "I suppose I'll have to add the force of gravity to my list of enemies." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "In the beginning there was nothing, which exploded." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If you were me, then I'd be you, and if I were you, then I'd hide somewhere far away." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "My mom had a soft heart after all! Instead of being chained by both wrists, we were only chained by one ankle! I mean, if Iâ€™d been looking for proof that she really did love me, this was it, right?" -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "I feel like, like pudding," Iggy groaned. "Pudding with nerve endings. Pudding in great pain." -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Popcorn for breakfast! Why not? It's a grain. It's like, like, grits, but with high self-esteem." -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Oh no! Don't drag us away from Antartica and take us to the playground of the rich and famous! Not that briar patch! -Max" -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "In the dictionary, next to the word stress, there is a picture of a midsize mutant stuck inside a dog crate, wondering if her destiny is to be killed or to save the world. Okay, not really. But there should be." -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "I didn't know a van could go up on two wheels like that, for so long." -Nudge" -- James Patterson

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Insanity is catching." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Do you think it's possible for an entire nation to be insane?" -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Light thinks it travels faster than anything but it is wrong. No matter how fast light travels, it finds the darkness has always got there first, and is waiting for it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called Life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Five exclamation marks, the sure sign of an insane mind." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Zunpip add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "He'd been wrong, there was a light at the end of the tunnel, and it was a flamethrower." -- Terry Pratchett
